statements: DELETE FROM luxury_real_estate_security WHERE client_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM luxury_real_estate_security WHERE client_name = 'John Doe' AND client_phone = '+1234567890';
DELETE FROM financial_information WHERE client_id = 100 AND category = 'investment';
DELETE FROM luxury_real_estate_clients WHERE client_id = 1002 AND status = 'active';
DELETE FROM financial_information WHERE income > 1000000 AND approved = 'yes';
DELETE FROM properties WHERE property_name = 'House A';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE client_id IN (SELECT client_id FROM clients WHERE client_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment' AND property_price > 100000;
